Jerry Zhiya

Front-end Developer

About me

Hi, I'm Jerry Zhiya, a passionate Front-End Developer based in Nigeria. I specialize in crafting responsive, accessible, and visually engaging web experiences using modern technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React. With a strong eye for design and a deep understanding of user experience, I transform ideas into interactive interfaces that not only look great but also perform seamlessly across devices. Whether it's building single-page applications, optimizing performance, or integrating APIs, I thrive on turning complex problems into elegant solutions. I believe in clean code, continuous learning, and collaboration. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or refining my skills with the latest web tools like Webpack, Git, and Figma. Service

I create websites that adapt beautifully to all screen sizes, ensuing a seamless experience on mobile, tablet, and desktop

I optimize websites for speed, SEO, accessibility to deliver fast-loading and user-friendly experience

Single Page Application

I build dynamic SPAs using framework like react or Vue for smooth, app-like user experience

Website Maintenace

I offer ongoing support and updates to keep your website secure, fresh, and functioning perfectly
